categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Executioner was a male Devaronian bounty hunter active during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He had red skin and a scarred face.
Having once killed the Phydolon Alk ol Nojj, he was later confronted by Ark ol Loor, but she was rescued by a Force-sensitive old man, who Force pushed the Executioner.
The Executioner appears in the opening story in Fantasy Flight Games' 2018 roleplaying game sourcebook Knights of Fate.
